Interaction Summary: Spinach is high in vitamin K, which counteracts Warfarin and reduces its effectiveness.
Recommendation: Limit intake of vitamin K-rich foods like spinach.

Interaction Summary: Grapefruit juice can increase blood levels of Atorvastatin, increasing risk of muscle damage.
Recommendation: Avoid grapefruit juice while taking Atorvastatin.

Alcohol may increase the risk of lactic acidosis when taken with Metformin.
Soy can interfere with the absorption of Levothyroxine.
